description.@en: Raising the lightning rod into the air, arcs fly outwards toward your enemies.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes equal to your [WB]. Providing you can see them, each foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but they are Incapacitated! instead. In addition, if your foes fail to Resist with an Athletics Test, they are knocked Prone.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes are automatically set On Fire and are knocked Prone.

criticalFailure.@en: The copper rod is instantly incinerated, as a bolt of lightning strikes you from above. You suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. You are Incapacitated! and knocked Prone.
